name: A Forest Fair And Still
description:
Originally created for 48 Hour Game Jam in 2009

As celestial beings, place towers to win favor in this selfish battle, born of lovers scorned. 

Inspired by Skirnismal, for the 2009 48 Hour Game Making Competition

Key words:
Storm
Giant
Love

Programming:

Steve Halliwell
Joshua Sanderson

Art Lead:

Ellen Blaha

Animation:

James Giles

Project Management:
